values.name: arambai
values.description: Burmese unique unit. Mounted dart thrower.

values.name: arbalest
values.description: Stronger than Crosbowman. Quick and light.

values.name: archer
values.description: Quick and light. Weak at close range; excels at battle from distance.

values.name: ballista-elephant
values.description: Khmer unique unit. Heavy cavalry equipped with a Scorpion. Can fell trees.

values.name: battering-ram
values.description: Slow, lumbering siege weapon used to reduce enemy towns to ruins.

values.name: battle-elephant
values.description: Slow and heavy cavalry.

values.name: berserk
values.description: Viking unique unit. Infantry that slowly heals itself.

values.name: bombard-canon
values.description: Powerful mobile anti-building siege weapon.

values.name: boyar
values.description: Slavic Unique Unit. Heavily armored cavalry; resistant to melee attack.

values.name: camel
values.description: Excels at killing other mounted units.

values.name: camel-archer
values.description: Berber unique unit. Cavalry archer with an attack bonus vs. cavalry archers.

values.name: cannon-galleon
values.description: Long-range warship used to attack targets on shore to establish beachhead.

values.name: capped-ram
values.description: Stronger than Battering Ram. Slow, lumbering siege weapon used to reduce enemy towns to ruins.

values.name: caravel
values.description: Portuguese unique unit. Boat effective vs. large fleets because each shot damages multiple units.

values.name: cataphract
values.description: Byzantine unique unit. Heavily armored cavalry.

values.description: Stronger than Knight. Fast and heavy cavalry.

values.name: champion

values.description: Italian mercenary unit. Quick infantry.

values.name: demolition-raft
values.description: Filled with explosives. Self-destructs when used.

values.name: demolition-ship
values.description: Filled with explosives. Self-destructs when used.

UnitClass.description: Unit classes that define general unit types

values.name: all-units-class
values.description: Needs defining with number -1. Class contains all units in the game
note: Usage: Piority setting, unit counting, villager management.

values.name: archery-cannon-class
values.description: Class containing all hand cannoneer units

values.name: archery-class
values.description: Class containing all unmounted ranged archers
note: Included: archer-line, skirmisher-line, chu-ko-nu-line, longbowman-line, plumed-archer-line

values.name: cavalry-archer-class
values.description: Mounted ranged units

values.name: cavalry-cannon-class
values.description: Consists only of conquistador-line

values.name: cavalry-class
values.description: Mounted melee units except scout-cavalry

values.name: fishing-ship-class
values.description: Contains fishing-ship unit

values.name: forage-bush-class
values.description: Contains only gaia forage bush units

values.name: infantry-class
values.description: Infantry units

values.name: king-class
values.description: Containing king units and related heroes

values.name: livestock-class
values.description: Herdable animals that can be hunted for food

values.name: monastery-class
values.description: Contains all monastery trainable units

values.name: monk-with-relic-class
values.description: Monks actively holding relics

values.name: packed-trebuchet-class
values.description: Class containing only the packed trebuchet unit, which is the referenced unit `trebuchet` (331)
note: Usage: Piority setting, unit counting, villager management.

values.name: petard-class
values.description: Class containing only the `petard` unit (440)

values.name: scorpion-class
values.description: Class containing scorpion units

values.name: scout-cavalry-class
values.description: Special class for the scout cavalry to prevent them getting attacked by Gaia wolves

values.name: siege-weapon-class
values.description: All siege weapons

values.name: trade-cart-class
values.description: Trade carts

values.name: trade-cog-class
values.description: Trading ships

values.name: transport-ship-class
values.description: Transport ships

values.name: unpacked-trebuchet-class
values.description: Class containing only the unpacked trebuchet unit (42)
note: Usage: Piority setting, unit counting, villager management.

values.name: villager-class
values.description: Villager unit class

values.name: warship-class
values.description: Warship class

values.description: Dangerous animal that can be hunted for food (not herdable)

values.description: A horse

values.description: An ostrich (it's pretty fast)
